Name: Trials of Old
Description:
A secret letter finds its way to your hands.
It tells of a mysterious trial at Porto-Veno Castle, one with unmistakable links to the Fisalia family...

<color=highlight>Hidden rewards can be found in this area.</color>

Conditions.PreQuestName: The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Trial Invitation letter? Looks like this was meant for someone else. How did it end up here?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Something about a trial... and a miraculous elixir? Smells fishy. Better take a trip to Porto-Veno Castle and see what's really going on.
Yes, my lord...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will give everything to pass this trail!

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you one of the candidates?
I believe this letter belongs to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My lord said there are four trials scattered around Porto-Veno Castle. Each one holds a medal... I need to complete them all!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've got to get that elixir and become ██ to save Jojo!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't waste another moment. I must go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chloe disappears into the distance just as she finishes her sentence.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My lord...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I passed all the trials.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I now present to you these four medals!

Options.PlotLineKey: Huh? I was the one who passed the trials...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are too kind, my lord... Does this mean I am to be accepted as ██?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the elixir mentioned in the letter. Please, I need it to cure Jojo's illness...

Options.PlotLineKey: Is that all there is to the trials...?
Could such a miraculous elixir really exist...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm? I see. So the trials before were only the beginning...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. I will give everything to pass the remaining trials, my lord. I will become ██!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chloe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jojo needs that elixir to get better!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
With her decision made, you watch Chloe walk towards Porto-Veno Castle without any hesitation.
Instead of opening the gate, she passes right through it.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This feeling... Was everything just an illusion? Did it begin the moment I met Chloe? Or was it when I received that letter?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chloe must've been the first to face whatever trial this was at some point in the past.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If what I saw in that illusion is true... then she entered Porto-Veno Castle afterward.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But did she finish the trial? Did she even make it out...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
You give the gate a push, but it won't budge.
For some reason, you get the feeling of a swiming above water for a breath of fresh air, the moment you placed your hand on the gate.
